experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: SpringTech
workDescription: Design, develop, and maintain web applications using modern programming languages, frameworks, and tools.
Lead a small team of 4 developers using React and ASP.NET.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements, and translate them into technical specifications.
Develop and implement front-end interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and frameworks (React, Vue, Angular, Next), ensuring a seamless user experience.
Build robust and scalable back-end systems using server-side programming languages (Nod.js, C#, Python, Ruby, Java) and frameworks (Express, ASP.NET, Django, Ruby on Rails, Spring).
Integrate third-party APIs and services to enhance application functionality.
Write efficient and optimized code, conduct unit testing, and debug applications to ensure high performance and reliability.
Designed and implemented cloud infrastructure on AWS and GCP, including EC2 instances, S3 buckets, and Cloud Functions.
Implemented and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI/CD.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in full stack development, and share knowledge with the team.
Collaborate with team members on code reviews, technical discussions, and problem-solving.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: CamelWeb
workDescription: Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure that the web application met the client's requirements.
Troubleshot and debugged issues in the web application, improving the overall user experience.
Designed and maintained the database schema, wrote queries, and optimized database performance.
Implemented continuous integration and deployment using Jenkins and Docker.
Stayed up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in web development, continuously improving skills and knowledge.
